template.subject: Request: Bundestag Action on Iran Human Rights Crisis
template.body:
Dear {{recipientName}},

I am writing to request urgent action by the Bundestag regarding the human rights crisis in Iran.

Since 28 December 2025:
• Over 51 peaceful protesters have been killed by Iranian security forces
• More than 2,270 people have been arbitrarily detained
• A nationwide internet blackout has been imposed
• Documented use of live ammunition against civilians

Germany, as the EU's largest economy, has significant influence in shaping European policy towards Iran. I respectfully request that the Bundestag:

1. Hold hearings on the human rights situation in Iran
2. Support EU-wide sanctions against officials responsible for abuses
3. Call for the immediate release of detained protesters
4. Coordinate with other EU member states on a unified response
5. Support technology initiatives to restore internet access in Iran

Germany has a special responsibility to stand against authoritarianism. I urge you to act now.

With respect,
A concerned citizen from {{senderCountry}}
